lyrics.stanza: I want to thank God for making me, So very specially. Each part so perfectly, He made me awesomely! I want to thank God for making me, He made me wonderfully, For He created me!

Oh yes, my bones, my muscle, stomach And my lungs, my heart and brain, My external parts, my skin, body and head. Your works are wonderful And my soul knows it well. I will give thanks; Thank You Lord for I am Wonderfully made.
